title: Angey idi mulangudhu Song Lyrics Udumban
stanzas:
vella nalla kudhira mela
veecharuvaa kayyil yendhi
vettaiyaada vaaraar angae
koatta karuppasamy

alayaa malai azhagaa
maamaranga undu panni
silaiyaaga nikkuraare
deivamaana karuppasamy

karutha muthu enna pola
vadivazhagan karuppasamy
karutha muthu enna pola
vadivazhagan karuppasamy
sevatha thundu thalaiyil katti
thaedi vettai aadi varraar (2)

thanda kaiyyil yendhi
aadi varran karuppen
aruva mela ninnu aadi
varraan karuppen.(2)

appoda nalla konda poattu
koatha muthu pallazhagan

koana nalla konda poattu
koatha muthu pallazhagan
kodiya vettai aadi angae
vaaraar angae karuppasamy

koana nalla konda poattu
koatha muthu pallazhagan
kodiya vettai aadi angae
vaaraar angae karuppasamy
